suite.name: Task Viewing
suite.description: Users can view all tasks in the system organized by boards by selecting the "Task Board" option. Each task will display its title, a brief description, and action options. Users can also view the complete details of a task by clicking the "View" button associated with each task.

custom.steps: Open the app. Click on New Task quick access button. Fill-in the information in the fields Push the Create button Push the View button from Done, In Progress and Open board
custom.expected: Verify the Create Task page is opened. Fill-in the given information and push Create button. The Task Board page is opened and different boards Done, In Progress and Open are displayed.View button should be displayed too.
